description: All other names under which the charities will solicit. Includes Entity Name, FEIN (Federal Employer Identification Number), and state identification number, and alternate name. The Colorado office of the Secretary of State Division of Charity registers charitable organizations that solicit contributions in Colorado and their professional fundraisers. A charitable organization is a type of non-profit organization (NPO) that centers on philanthropic goals as well as social well-being (educational, religious, other activities serving the public interest or common good). Search for “sos-csi” for all other charities related datasets.
